spec.question_description: The base domain of your website (Eg: example.org), this must be a domain name you own and can't be a subdomain. WARNING: Think carefully as this decision can only be made once.
Do you have existing web services at this domain? If so select 'true' you'll need to configure a .well-known entry at this domain before deploying. Contact support if you need assistance doing this.
Sets the subdomain of the Element web-client, you should only specify the subdomain, not the base domain you've already specified above. (Eg: 'element' for element.example.org)
The BYO servers root password, only needed if hosters public SSH key isn't loaded into it.
The IPv4 address of the existing server. Must be defined.
The IPv6 address of the existing server.
